salaryExpectations: LKR 70,000 (Executive) to LKR 600,000+ (Head of Digital) per month.
futureOutlook: Digital marketing is no longer optional for businesses; it's essential. This has created an explosion in demand for professionals who can navigate the digital landscape. Those who can demonstrate a clear impact on a company's bottom line through data-driven strategies will have the most successful and lucrative careers.
